name: purposewrite
tagline: Write quality content - resonating with your target audience
description: Write quality content that truly resonates with your target audience. Guides you through strategic content creation: generating fresh ideas while maintaining your brand's voice, ensuring every piece you create is impactful and aligned with your goals.

name: HeroUI Chat
tagline: The easiest way to  generate beautiful UIs
description: HeroUI Chat turns prompts or screenshots into beautiful, production ready React applications with AI. Built on our open-source HeroUI library (23k+ stars, 600k+ downloads), it’s design and code, all in one

name: Purposeful Poop
tagline: How much do you get paid to poop?
description: I made money pooping at work this year. Figure out how much you made!

name: OpenBnB
tagline: Book homes directly while browsing Airbnb
description: Install OpenBnB extension to instantly find direct booking links while browsing Airbnb and save on fees.

name: DockFlow
tagline: Switch between dock presets on MacOS instantly
description: Boost your productivity with DockFlow. Instantly save, manage, and switch between multiple macOS Docks. It's simple and built for focus.

name: FormSanitizer
tagline: Stop spammy form submissions with custom filters.
description: Tired of your website forms getting hammered by spam? I was too! That's why I built FormSanitizer - the simple solution that finally stopped the endless junk. It's the easy way to reclaim your inbox and focus on real submissions.

name: PeekNote
tagline: Lightweight always-on-top notes for devs & multitaskers
description: PeekNote is a lightweight, always-on-top macOS app for copying, pasting, and organizing text. Perfect for developers and multitaskers—keep code snippets, notes, and tasks instantly accessible with color-coded tabs and blocks.

name: AI Infographics
tagline: Convert text into stunning editable visuals in seconds.
description: Transform your content into professional infographics with Infographics AI. Generate customizable visuals for blogs, presentations, reports, and social media effortlessly. Get started for free.

name: Marketplace for Claude
tagline: Effortlessly connect AI to your everyday apps
description: Securely connect Claude Desktop to your favorite apps (Notion, Slack, Airtable, etc.) in under 90 seconds. Empower LLM to take action on your behalf, automate routine tasks, and streamline workflows. Unlock AI's full potential and boost your productivity.

name: Doodlify - Doodle Your Images
tagline: Turn your photos into cute, 2D flat & colorful doodles!
description: Turn your photos into beautiful hand-drawn colorful doodle style artwork in seconds. Upload your image and watch the magic happen!

name: bubutales
tagline: tales based on cartoons/movies/anime and games
description: Find tales for your kid, based on: - cartoons - movies - anime - games Interesting for parents also! ⏱️ Two Versions: 2min, 5min 🌍 3 Languages: Ukrainian / English / Turkish 🎧 Voiceover: Added voiceover Me and my wife recorded all tales in Ukrainian

name: MappingSpace ALM
tagline: AI powered ALM (application lifecycle management)
description: MappingSpace ALM provides an AI-powered solution that meets the V-model R&D process requirements for manufacturing while integrating the best practices of agile development. It satisfies the quality regulatory standards such as ASPICE, IEC61508, DO178C, etc.

name: VdoCipher
tagline: Securely stream your videos without the risk of piracy.
description: With Vdocipher you can stream your videos securely. Our video DRM, Piracy Blocker & Hacker Identification work together to stop piracy in its tracks. Get everything you need in one package, including a Custom Player, WordPress & Moodle plugins, APIs, and SDKs.

name: Kilpi
tagline: The modern open source TypeScript authorization framework
description: Kilpi is an modern open-source authorization framework for TypeScript applications. It makes authorization simple, intuitive and scalable with well defined patterns for protecting your application's every aspect.

name: Saas Ideas Wiki
tagline: Start Building What People Actually Want
description: Our weekly newsletter delivers validated SaaS opportunities straight to your inbox, sourced from real user pain points across the web.

name: Hirestein
tagline: Smart Hiring, Powered by AI
description: We are developing a next-generation recruitment platform powered by AI. In our initial version, we’ve built live CV screening, smart interview scheduling, and conducting AI-driven interviews, all supported by clean, detailed reporting and analytics.

name: Fact Check
tagline: A one-click tool to Fact Check anything you read online
description: Fact Check is an app which lets you highlight any text online to Fact Check it — instantly, in a pop-up that never breaks your flow. No more being lied to. No more tab switching. Fact Check the internet now.

name: frost
tagline: AI Book Publisher - Write books in minutes, not months
description: Write books in minutes, not months. frost is an AI-powered writing platform that helps you turn your ideas into polished manuscripts faster than ever before.

name: WordMate
tagline: Learn new words fast with smart AI commands
description: WordMate is an AI-powered vocabulary builder that helps you master new words through quizzes, real-time conversations, and adaptive learning. Perfect for learners, test-takers, and curious minds who want to speak and write more confidently.

name: COCREATE
tagline: Turn ideas into products — AI-powered & enterprise-ready
description: Turn your idea into a live product in under 90 mins. AI-powered, enterprise-ready, secure, and cost-effective. Personalized cloud environments, instant previews, built-in observability, zero setup. Just innovate—we handle the rest, ready to scale when you are.
